author: PlayStation
description:
Atelier Ryza Secret Trilogy Deluxe Pack is coming to PlayStation®5 & PlayStation®4 on November 13th, 2025.

This title is a definitive collection featuring all three titles from the “Secret” series. This Deluxe Pack will include exclusive content such as new playable characters and new story elements for each of the three titles.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #atelierryza
title: Atelier Ryza Secret Trilogy Deluxe Pack - First Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10009568

Wage all-out war with infantry and vehicle combat, class-based squad play, and cutting-edge audiovisual immersion. Where Fighter Jets, Tanks, skydiving RPGS, Heavy Artillery, and high-intensity infantry combat become one. 

Demolish your surroundings for a strategic advantage with Tactical Destruction. Turn your vehicle into a wrecking ball, bury a squad under a ceiling, or create new paths to victory.

Battlefield’s new Kinesthetic Combat System makes you more connected to your soldier and environment than ever before. With overhauled gunplay and tactical movement, from crouch sprint to drag and revive, every shot and movement is more instinctual and precise.

#ps5 #ps5games #battlefield6 

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
title: Battlefield 6 - Multiplayer Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011556/

Cronos: The New Dawn will be released at September 5th 2025. See brand new Story Trailer and dive deep in twisted time-travel story set both in post apocalyptic future and 1980, Poland. 

#ps5 #ps5games #chronosodegames 

Rated Mature
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The fan favorite PAC-MAN WORLD 2 returns modernized, enhanced, and upgraded as PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC!

The Ghosts snuck into PAC-Village and stole the Golden Fruit, unwittingly freeing the all-powerful ghost king, Spooky! Now it's up to PAC-MAN to venture across PAC-LAND, retrieve the Golden Fruit, and put a stop to the dastardly Spooky once more.

With modern graphics, expanded levels and PAC-Village, quality of life improvements, and voice acting - PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC is the fan favorite remade from scratch with the original recipe.

The adventure is back on the menu!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps5games #pacmanworld2
title: Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Keep the good times rolling with a new entry in the Katamari Damacy series! 🌈

In this puzzle action/adventure game, you'll roll your Katamari through time itself. Journey through the Jurassic Period, Ice Age, historic Japan, and more eras to rebuild the starry sky.

Experience a fabulous new soundtrack and never-before-seen support tools like the magnet, used to draw in nearby objects. Plus, play as The Prince (or one of his 68 cousins) and customize their colors and faces to create your own original design.

Plus, compete online against others around the world with the KatamariBall multiplayer mode!

This will be an experience for the ages!

#ps5 #ps5games #OnceUponAKATAMARI
title: Once Upon A Katamari - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014853/

BrokenLore: DON'T WATCH is a psychological horror game from the BrokenLore series.
Available August 18, 2025, on PS4 and PS5.

In the game, you play as Shinji, a hikikomori confined to a 6-square-meter Tokyo apartment.
But something is watching, and it’s getting closer.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #brokenlore
title: BrokenLore: Don't Watch - Release Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
